alert.note: Alert for Bee; Duval; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Jim Wells; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 24 at 3:01AM CST until December 24 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 20. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23 expected. * WHERE...La Salle, McMullen, Live Oak, Bee, Goliad, Victoria, Duval, Jim Wells, Inland Refugio and Inland Calhoun Counties. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, until noon CST today. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will exceed 25 degrees by mid- morning but will stay near or below freezing the entire morning.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
